name: Gorilla Jump 2015 - Gorilla Run
description:
Keep jumping to collect as many coins as you can

HOW TO PLAY
- Tap once to jump and attack
- Tap twice to double jump
- Avoid obstacles
- Collect coin to level up

FEATURES
- Nice graphic, fun & very addicted
- 20 missions to accomplish
- Simple tap control, easy to play and suitable for all ages
